LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing the ultimate mobile creation platform!
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Transform Your Ideas into Mobile Masterpieces
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Empower your creativity with our intuitive app-building tools. Design, develop, and deploy stunning mobile applications with ease, no coding experience required.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Design, Build, and Launch Your Dream Mobile Apps with Ease
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Create stunning mobile designs with our intuitive interface and extensive library of components.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Build powerful mobile applications using our comprehensive set of development tools and frameworks.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Seamlessly publish your mobile apps to app stores and reach millions of users worldwide.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Create stunning mobile designs with our user-friendly drag-and-drop interface, making app development accessible to everyone.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Build once, deploy everywhere. Our app ensures your mobile creations work seamlessly across iOS and Android platforms.
FEATURE_3_BODY: See your app come to life instantly with our real-time preview feature, allowing for quick iterations and improvements.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Access a vast collection of pre-built components and templates to speed up your mobile app development process.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Ensure your app's quality with our built-in testing suite, covering everything from functionality to user experience.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Take your app from concept to reality with our streamlined publishing process, getting your creation into app stores effortlessly.
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's bring your mobile vision to life. Fill out the form below to get started!
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_LOGIN_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Log in to your creator account
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_GOOGLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEX: Sign up with Google for quick access
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our mobile-making app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app is a revolutionary platform that allows users to design, customize, and create their own mobile devices from scratch, all through an intuitive digital interface.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the mobile-making process work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Users can select components, design the exterior, choose specifications, and even create custom software features. Once designed, the app coordinates with our manufacturing partners to bring your unique mobile device to life.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Is any technical expertise required to use the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Not at all! Our app is designed to be user-friendly for everyone, from tech novices to experts. We provide guidance and explanations throughout the process to help you make informed decisions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How long does it take to receive my custom-made mobile?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Typically, it takes 4-6 weeks from the time you finalize your design to when you receive your custom-made mobile. This includes manufacturing, quality checks, and shipping time.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I modify my mobile design after ordering?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Once an order is placed, major changes cannot be made. However, you can make minor adjustments within 24 hours of placing your order. We recommend thoroughly reviewing your design before finalizing it.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is the Mobile Maker app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Mobile Maker is an innovative app that allows you to design and customize your own mobile devices, from smartphones to tablets, with ease and creativity.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I really create my own mobile device?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Absolutely! Our app provides a user-friendly interface where you can select components, customize designs, and even simulate the performance of your unique mobile creation.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Do I need technical expertise to use Mobile Maker?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Not at all! Our app is designed for users of all skill levels. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or a complete beginner, our intuitive tools and guided process make mobile creation accessible to everyone.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I order the mobile device I create through the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: While our current version focuses on design and simulation, we're working on partnerships with manufacturers to bring your creations to life. Stay tuned for updates on ordering custom devices in the future!

TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: From concept to launch, this tool has been invaluable. It's a game-changer for mobile creation.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a startup, we needed efficiency and flexibility. This app delivered both, helping us create stunning mobiles quickly.
